Writers.

Casey Tourangeau

Casey studied film theory at Carleton University, where he learned to build a staunch academic defense of the work of Steven Spielberg. He is also an award-winning film editor whose work has been screened at festivals across North America and Europe, including the Austin Film Festival and San Francisco Doc Fest. His work on the documentary *Vampiro: Angel, Devil, Hero* earned him the best editing award at the Monterrey International Film Festival.

By Casey Tourangeau
